title: (x) The Art of Dragon Magazine nameplate blackletter - ITC Honda {Jan E}
content:
Can anyone suggest a similar typeface to this blackface, used on an early Dungeons and Dragons manual?

[http://www.andygoldman.com/dragon.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419133717/http:/www.andygoldman.com/dragon.jpg "http://www.andygoldman.com/dragon.jpg")

Thanks
author: andy goldman

comments.content:
It’s ITC Honda except for the a. That’s somehow custom.

[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Honda](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419133717/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Honda "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Honda")
That was fast. Thank you! Much appreciated.
